title: Bug 14047StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
EB: Redrawing the entire client area when appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode should be more efficient and optimized.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:  
1. Enable word wrap mode in the StyledText component.  
2. Append N lines of text to the StyledText.  
3. Observe that the entire client area is redrawn N times.
